{{flagicon|Turkey|size=22px}} [[Turkish Resistance Organisation|TMT]] |style="background:#efefef"| '''Defeat'''{{cite book|last1=Fortna|first1=Virginia Page|title=Peace Time: Cease-fire Agreements and the Durability of Peace|date=2004|publisher=Princeton University Press|isbn=9780691115122|page=89|url=https://books.google.co.uk/books?id=7MXPOz95A_IC&printsec=frontcover&source=gbs_ge_summary_r&cad=0#v=onepage&q&f=false}} *Turkish occupation of 36.2% of Cyprus.http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/embassies/embassy_brussels.nsf/geninfo_en/geninfo_en?OpenDocument |- |} ==Other armed conflicts involving Cyprus== *[[Greco-Persian Wars]] 499-449 BC *[[Ionian Revolt]] 499-493 BC *[[Egyptian raid on Larnaca International Airport|Raid on Larnaca Airport]] 1978 ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Middle East topic|List of wars involving|title=Lists of wars involving Middle Eastern countries}} {{Asia topic|List of wars involving|title=Lists of wars involving Asian countries}} {{Europe topic|List of wars involving|title=Lists of wars involving European countries}} [[Category:Wars involving Cyprus| ]] [[Category:Military history of Cyprus|*Wars]] [[Category:Lists of wars by country|Cyprus]] [[Category:Cyprus history-related lists|Wars]]
